Title: Den of Thieves
Writer: Christian Gudegast (screenplay by), Christian Gudegast (story by), Paul T. Scheuring (story by)
Actors: Gerard Butler, Pablo Schreiber, O'Shea Jackson Jr., 50 Cent
Plot: An elite unit of the LA County Sheriff's Dept. and the state's most successful bank robbery crew clash as the outlaws plan a seemingly impossible heist on the Federal Reserve Bank.
Production: Diamond Film Productions, Tucker Tooley Entertainment, G-BASE
